import React, { Component } from 'react' import * as emailjs from 'emailjs-com' import Layout from '../components/layout' import { Button, FormFeedback, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input } from 'reactstrap' class Contact extends Component { state = { name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', } handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() const { name, email, message } = this.state let templateParams = { from_name: email, to_name: '', message_html: message, } emailjs.send( 'gmail', 'template_XXXXXXXX', templateParams, 'user_XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX' ) this.resetForm() } resetForm() { this.setState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', }) } handleChange = (param, e) => { this.setState({ [param]: e.target.value }) } render() { return ( <>

Get in Touch

 ) } } export default Contact
